articles.author: Alejandra O'Connell-Domenech
articles.title: New stroke guidelines include risk factors specifically for women - The Hill
articles.description: Stroke guidelines now include risks that are unique to women.   The American Stroke Association, a division of the American Heart Association, released new stroke prevention guidelines this week for the first time in a decade. The focus of the guidelines is t…
